channel.title: Ya.. this a mopar mod
channel.description:
http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,321189.0.html
Why is he a mod?
Everyone on moparscape thinks he's an idiot.
He locks a topic by accident, he has locked several topics that have been about requesting help.
[quote="Thug-life, post:90, topic:241497"]Oh and do you always have something stupid to say hasumon?[/quote]
Thug-life pointed it out well on the staff topic in MSCP.
He is immature and has poor decision skills. He has shown no signs of improvement either..
Well.. it'll be interesting to see all your input..
EDIT: Here's some more idiocy: http://moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=profile;u=146065;sa=showPosts [center][img]http://www.moparisthebest.org/smf/Themes/default/images/warnmute.gif[/img] You are fully aware of the topic on that side of the forums to post about staff rants. By posting here you have attempted to create and attack a certain member. [/center]

item.title: Ya.. this a mopar mod
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

Post it on the MoparScape staff rants thread; we also don’t support the verbal attacking towards any member.
